channel.title: Rep is so conufusing
channel.description:
Err, I need help. What are all the meanings of the 'YOU CANTZ TALKZ ABOUT REP' rule?
Add to the list until it's done.
1. No asking for rep
and my question is, can you say your gonna give rep if they do a lil sumthin?

item.title: Rep is so conufusing
item.dc:creator: @o_town_reaper o_town_reaper
item.description:
@o_town_reaper wrote:

Well seeing how it says you can’t ask for rep but nothing about talking about it so I guess you can talk just not ask. I don’t know I could be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep is so conufusing
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Its ‘you rep me, I’ll rep you’ - as VB7 said. Melissa did that until he got 100+ and nothing ever happened to him. I wonder why?

Read full topic

item.title: Rep is so conufusing
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:11, topic:133362”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=184615.msg1673343#msg1673343 date=1187077792]
Yes, but alot of people swap rep, ALOT. Ever been on the Moparscape forum? People with 250+ rep is outrageous. I think that should be looked into, eh Mopar?
[/quote]
I heard something on the Irc(not naming names) about someone who did that, and got a re-set.

But what does it mean by “swapping rep”?
As in like “I’ll rep you on moparscape, if you rep me on mitb?”
Or like selling it?[/quote]

I think it’s more like, “you rep me, I’ll rep you”. I’m just guessing though.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep is so conufusing
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:5, topic:133362”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=184615.msg1673230#msg1673230 date=1187074845]
You can talk about it just not ask for it or say you will give it for help etc…
[/quote]

Unless of course you say it privately in a pm. ;)[/quote]

Actually this happens a lot, the pm gets reported and your rep gets reset to 0 anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep is so conufusing
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

jme_009:

In the somewhat recent past it was changed so that you could talk about rep, you just can’t ask for it. It was changed in the rules, but not the ToS. Also some people still haven’t even noticed it was changed so they still yell at people for it.

And someone changed the rule for no misleading posts in your signature, without my knowledge, and as a result, I got a warning.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep is so conufusing
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The problem is, the rule used to be that you couldn’t talk about rep in anyway. This rule was inherited by kaitnieks.com because there was a problem with people asking for it and stuff.

In the somewhat recent past it was changed so that you could talk about rep, you just can’t ask for it. It was changed in the rules, but not the ToS. Also some people still haven’t even noticed it was changed so they still yell at people for it.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Unless of course you say it privately in a pm. ;)[/quote]
Well then I wouldn’t know about it then now would I? lol

item.title: Rep is so conufusing
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

As far as i know, your allowed to talk about it, just not ask for it, or hint for any. or probably anything about giving/taking. it.

I’m sure one of the mods will probably correct me though…

Read full topic
